emuInput.TitMainTitle: Eddie Cooper and Wilhelmina handing out samples to women carrying basket style purses, behind Pepsi and Teem booth, at 1963 Pittsburgh Courier - WAMO, Home-A-Rama fair, Syria Mosque
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 15, 1963, p. 15, reads: "The 1963 Courier-WAMO Home-A-Rama. Pittsburgh's only home and food show, opened before a huge throng last Thursday, June 6, at the spacious Syria Mosque in Oakland...  15. Pepsi Cola Metropolitan Bottling Co., Inc. Wilhelmina and son, Eddie Cooper."
